name: Dark Fantasy: Epic Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
The most atmospheric jigsaw puzzle game ever has come back!

  • 24 different jigsaw puzzles to complete
  • Each puzzle with 12, 24, 48, 96, 192 and 384 pieces
  • Save/load progress!
  • Highly replayable, hours of gameplay
  • The most atmospheric game of its genre
  • Two alternative evil voices male/female for commentary
  • Optional against time and no-cheat game modes
  • Great soundtrack and effects
  • 96 achievements
  • Leaderboards
  • Gallery for completed portraits
  • Different backgrounds
